title: Lucas Paqueta transfer news: Flamengo complete £36.5m deal to re-sign Brazil midfielder from West Ham
desc: Lucas Paqueta has completed a £36.5m (€42m) move to Flamengo from West Ham; Paqueta joined West Ham from Lyon for a club-record fee in 2022; the Brazil international made 139 appearances for the Hammers, scoring 23 goals and registering 15 assists

title: Covering the Fastest Computers in the World and the People Who Run Them

title: New Blood Test Could Help Detect Pancreatic Cancer Earlier
